root.name: Akiba’s Trip
root.description: Akiba's Trip is an action adventure being developed and published by Acquire for the PlayStation Portable. In the game, the player will roam Akihabara and use a special cell-phone called Mirror Snap to identify Kaguyashi, vampires who walk the streets as regular people. The player will then have to defeat them by weakening them in close combat, and stripping them of their clothes, exposing them to the sunlight and killing them.
